comment: Excellent. Sweetness, coconut and lite chocolate. Sweet molasses. Soft lite-lite nut. Loving this
A bit of sour mash, almost like tequila and Maker's in one

Wow is this stuff smooth!! I was expecting it to be much hotter because of the ABV but not the case at all. That being said, I do prefer full proof bourbons but this one blew my mind. Not only is it ultra smooth but it is packed with flavor. I bought myself this batch and batch 21 for my brother as a gift, glad I did so I can try both. I will being trying more of these for sure!
